name: Botanical TD
description:
Defend against evil snails with a variety of plants. It's up to you to choose the best towers in each level and develope the ultimate tactic. Snails come with different stats and get stronger over time.
What makes this TD SPECIAL are the power-ups for enemies YOU have to choose.

Build and upgrade plants!

  • Many unique plants: - You place fruits and vegetables all over the map finding the best positions for an effective defense. Combine their strengths to make them even stronger.
  • Upgrade plants: - Upgrade plants to their max level of 5.

Defend against strong enemies!

  • Enemies are snails: - Fight against evil snails with different size, speed and health.
  • Six special power-ups: - Every few waves you choose one out of three random power-ups for enemies.



Test your tactical ability in different game modes

  • Three different game modes: Destroy Crystals (easy/hard) and Endless Mode
  • Diverse maps: Fight on maps with many different mechanics like teleport, blocking paths, power-ups and much more!
